message:
http://img.youtube.com/vi/4MNz2ribmos/0.jpg
Turbo Imploder v3.0. Plays nice music when crunching.

Simplenote - http://simplenoteapp.com/.  It's like a bare bones, text-only Evernote. There are iOS and Android apps and programs for Mac/Windows/Linux.  You can sync your notes and access them anywhere.
Gizmos Freeware scratches all my freeware itches - http://www.techsupportalert.com/

the bane of all... VLC - http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ won't be my 1st choice of media player (it's quicktime + perian btw), but it's my definite 2nd choice. and thank god i downloaded the iOS version before they pull it from appstore.
